meanings.definition: A person who writes or performs melodramas.
meanings.sent1: The melodramatists rehearsed their lines for the play.
meanings.sent2: The group of melodramatists put on a captivating performance.
meanings.sent3: The melodramatists added humor to their melodrama script.
meanings.sent4: The melodramatists painted emotions with their words on stage.
meanings.sent5: The melodramatists brought the characters to life with their acting skills.
